name: Infrastructure Health Monitoring - Service Checks & Alerts

parameters.jsCode:
// Define services to monitor
const services = [
  {
    name: 'n8n',
    type: 'http',
    url: 'http://localhost:5678/healthz',
    timeout: 5000,
    critical: true,
    expectedStatus: [200],
    expectedContent: null
  },
  {
    name: 'claude-proxy',
    type: 'http', 
    url: `${process.env.CLAUDE_PROXY_URL}/health`,
    timeout: 10000,
    critical: true,
    expectedStatus: [200],
    expectedContent: 'healthy'
  },
  {
    name: 'qdrant-vector-db',
    type: 'http',
    url: `${process.env.VECTOR_DB_URL}/collections`,
    timeout: 5000,
    critical: true,
    expectedStatus: [200],
    expectedContent: null
  },
  {
    name: 'postgres-db',
    type: 'tcp',
    host: 'postgres-n8n',
    port: 5432,
    timeout: 3000,
    critical: true
  },
  {
    name: 'redis-cache',
    type: 'tcp',
    host: 'redis-n8n',
    port: 6379,
    timeout: 3000,
    critical: false
  },
  {
    name: 'prometheus',
    type: 'http',
    url: 'http://prometheus:9090/-/healthy',
    timeout: 5000,
    critical: false,
    expectedStatus: [200]
  },
  {
    name: 'grafana',
    type: 'http',
    url: 'http://grafana:3000/api/health',
    timeout: 5000,
    critical: false,
    expectedStatus: [200]
  },
  {
    name: 'sentence-transformers',
    type: 'http',
    url: 'http://sentence-transformers:8080/health',
    timeout: 10000,
    critical: false,
    expectedStatus: [200]
  }
];

return {
  services,
  checkId: `health_${Date.now()}`,
  timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
  totalServices: services.length,
  criticalServices: services.filter(s => s.critical).length
};

parameters.query: INSERT INTO health_checks (check_id, timestamp, overall_status, health_score, total_services, healthy_services, unhealthy_services, critical_failures, avg_response_time, details) VALUES ('{{ $json.checkId }}', '{{ $json.timestamp }}', '{{ $json.overallStatus }}', {{ $json.healthScore }}, {{ $json.statistics.total }}, {{ $json.statistics.healthy }}, {{ $json.statistics.unhealthy }}, {{ $json.statistics.critical }}, {{ $json.statistics.avgResponseTime }}, '{{ JSON.stringify($json.services).replace(/'/g, "''") }}');
